title: The Holiday Season Marketing Campaign
description: It’s almost hard to imagine the holiday season without the Postal Service. In this episode, we dive into the Postal Service's role in connecting people and the holidays with Sheila Holman, Vice President, Marketing. Join us as we’ll learn more about the theme of this year’s holiday campaign, the different elements that go into an integrated campaign, defining marketing success, and much more!
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
content:encoded: It’s almost hard to imagine the holiday season without the Postal Service. In this episode, we dive into the Postal Service's role in connecting people and the holidays with Sheila Holman, Vice President, Marketing. Join us as we’ll learn more about the theme of this year’s holiday campaign, the different elements that go into an integrated campaign, defining marketing success, and much more!
itunes:title: The Holiday Season Marketing Campaign
itunes:author: United States Postal Service
itunes:summary: This week on Mailin’ It, we chat about the strong connection between the Postal Service and the holiday season with Sheila Holman, Vice President, Marketing. We’ll get a behind-the-scenes look at this year’s holiday campaign and learn more about why the holiday season is the perfect time of year to remind the nation and our customers of what we do and what we offer!
